Package studio.dates.javamodule.validator.validator

Class Validator

java.lang.Object
studio.dates.javamodule.validator.validator.Validator
public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
Validator Class provides various common validation methods to validate single value.
If the target value does not match the required conditions, method throws a Validation Exception.
Version:
1.0.0 (Aug. 10, 2021)
Author:
Laurence B. Yamamoto (DatesStudio in Toyohashi, JAPAN)

      public static void isNull​(java.lang.Object target, java.lang.String name) throws NullViolationException
      Requires target to be null.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target.
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      NullViolationException - Validation Exception thrown when the target is not null.

      public static void isEmptyNotNull​(java.lang.String target, java.lang.String name) throws NotNullViolationException, EmptyViolationException
      Requires the target to be empty, but null is not allowed though.
      "Empty" means the target length = 0.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target.
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      EmptyViolationException - Validation Exception thrown when the target is not empty.
      NotNullViolationException - Validation Exception thrown when the target is null.

      public static void range​(int target, int minInclusive, int maxInclusive, java.lang.String name) throws NumericValueRangeViolationException
      Requires the integer target in the specified range.
      NOTE: For wrapper classes, use another variant instead.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target.
      minInclusive - Min value (inclusive).
      maxInclusive - Max value (inclusive).
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      NumericValueRangeViolationException - Validation Exception thrown when the target value is out of range.

    • range

      public static void range​(long target, long minInclusive, int maxInclusive, java.lang.String name) throws NumericValueRangeViolationException
      Requires the long integer target in the specified range. This is a variant for long integers.
      NOTE: For "Long" class, use another variant instead.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target.
      minInclusive - Min value (inclusive).
      maxInclusive - Max value (inclusive).
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      NumericValueRangeViolationException - Validation Exception thrown when the target value is out of range.

    • range

      public static void range​(double target, double min, BorderMethod minBorderMethod, double max, BorderMethod maxBorderMethod, java.lang.String name) throws NumericValueRangeViolationException
      Requires the float/double target in the specified range.
      NOTE: For wrapper classes, use another variant instead.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target.
      min - Min value.
      minBorderMethod - Defines the min border value is included or not.
      max - Max value.
      maxBorderMethod - Defines the max border value is included or not.
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      NumericValueRangeViolationException - Validation Exception thrown when the target value is out of range.

    • range

      public static void range​(java.lang.Number target, Nullable nullable, int minInclusive, int maxInclusive, java.lang.String name) throws NotNullViolationException, NumericValueRangeViolationException
      Requires the integer target in the specified range. This is a variant for integer wrapper classes.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target (Wrapper class).
      nullable - Two options:
      NOT_NULL: If null, the validation fails.
      ALLOW_NULL: If null, the validation succeeds.
      NOTE: Using other values are not recommended.
      minInclusive - Min value (inclusive).
      maxInclusive - Max value (inclusive).
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      NotNullViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_NULL but the target is NULL.
      NumericValueRangeViolationException - Validation Exception thrown when the target value is out of range.

    • length

      public static void length​(java.lang.String target, Nullable nullable, int minInclusive, int maxInclusive, java.lang.String name) throws NotNullViolationException, NotEmptyViolationException, LengthViolationException
      Check whether the target matches its min and max length requirement.
      NOTE: Calculated length can be different from it appears to humans.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target.
      nullable - Six options:
      NOT_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      NOT_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      ALLOW_NULL_NOT_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process. But if the target is empty (length = 0), then validation fails.
      NOT_NULL_ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation fails. But if the target is not null but empty (length=0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      minInclusive - Min length (inclusive).
      maxInclusive - Max length (inclusive).
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      NotNullViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_NULL but the target is NULL.
      NotEmptyViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_EMPTY but the target is EMPTY.
      LengthViolationException - Violation Exception thrown if the target length is out of range.

    • length

      public static void length​(java.lang.String target, Nullable nullable, int length, java.lang.String name) throws NotNullViolationException, NotEmptyViolationException, LengthViolationException
      Check whether the target matches its fixed length requirement.
      NOTE: Calculated length can be different from it appears to humans.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target.
      nullable - Six options:
      NOT_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      NOT_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      ALLOW_NULL_NOT_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process. But if the target is empty (length = 0), then validation fails.
      NOT_NULL_ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation fails. But if the target is not null but empty (length=0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      length - length.
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      NotNullViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_NULL but the target is NULL.
      NotEmptyViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_EMPTY but the target is EMPTY.
      LengthViolationException - Violation Exception thrown if the target length does not match the fixed length.

    • min

      public static void min​(java.lang.String target, Nullable nullable, int minInclusive, java.lang.String name) throws NotNullViolationException, NotEmptyViolationException, MinLengthViolationException
      Check whether the target matches its min length requirement.
      NOTE: Calculated length can be different from it appears to humans.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target.
      nullable - Six options:
      NOT_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      NOT_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      ALLOW_NULL_NOT_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process. But if the target is empty (length = 0), then validation fails.
      NOT_NULL_ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation fails. But if the target is not null but empty (length=0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      minInclusive - Min length (inclusive).
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      NotNullViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_NULL but the target is NULL.
      NotEmptyViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_EMPTY but the target is EMPTY.
      MinLengthViolationException - Violation Exception thrown if the target length does not match its min length requirement.

    • max

      public static void max​(java.lang.String target, Nullable nullable, int maxInclusive, java.lang.String name) throws NotNullViolationException, NotEmptyViolationException, MaxLengthViolationException
      Check whether the target matches its max length requirement.
      NOTE: Calculated length can be different from it appears to humans.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target.
      nullable - Six options:
      NOT_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      NOT_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      ALLOW_NULL_NOT_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process. But if the target is empty (length = 0), then validation fails.
      NOT_NULL_ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation fails. But if the target is not null but empty (length=0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      maxInclusive - Max length (inclusive).
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      NotNullViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_NULL but the target is NULL.
      NotEmptyViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_EMPTY but the target is EMPTY.
      MaxLengthViolationException - Violation Exception thrown if the target length does not match its max length requirement.

    • regex

      public static void regex​(java.lang.String target, Nullable nullable, java.lang.String regex, java.lang.String name) throws NotNullViolationException, NotEmptyViolationException, StringFormatViolationException
      Check whether the target matches the regular expression.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target.
      nullable - Six options:
      NOT_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      NOT_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      ALLOW_NULL_NOT_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process. But if the target is empty (length = 0), then validation fails.
      NOT_NULL_ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation fails. But if the target is not null but empty (length=0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      regex - Regular expression.
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      NotNullViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_NULL but the target is NULL.
      NotEmptyViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_EMPTY but the target is EMPTY.
      StringFormatViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if the target string does not match the regular expression.

    • http

      public static void http​(java.lang.String target, Nullable nullable, java.lang.String name) throws NotNullViolationException, EmptyViolationException, HttpFormatViolationException

      NOT_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation fails.

      ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      ALLOW_NULL_NOT_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process. But if the target is empty (length = 0), then validation fails.

    • phone

      public static void phone​(java.lang.String target, Nullable nullable, java.lang.String name) throws NotNullViolationException, EmptyViolationException, PhoneFormatViolationException
      Check whether the target matches phone number format.
      NOTE: This method only provide basic format check for phone numbers worldwide, but cannot check whether it matches the regional format.
      Parameters:
      target - Validation target.
      nullable - Six options:
      NOT_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_NULL: If the target is NULL, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      NOT_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation fails.
      ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is EMPTY (NULL or length = 0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      ALLOW_NULL_NOT_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process. But if the target is empty (length = 0), then validation fails.
      NOT_NULL_ALLOW_EMPTY: If the target is null, then the validation fails. But if the target is not null but empty (length=0), then the validation succeeds, and skips the following validation process.
      name - Name of the field to be checked. This parameter is used for the exception message.
      Throws:
      NotNullViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_NULL but the target is NULL.
      NotEmptyViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if "nullable" is set NOT_EMPTY but the target is EMPTY.
      PhoneFormatViolationException - Validation Exception thrown if the target string does not match phone number format.
      EmptyViolationException
